title: Remote Property Manager
job_overview:
**Property Management Experience REQUIRED**
**AppFolio experience is a PLUS**

About Us

Bay Property Management Group (BMG) is one of the fastest-growing property management companies in the Mid-Atlantic region. With over 5,300 properties under management and $600M in assets, we’re committed to delivering exceptional service to property owners and tenants alike. Join our dynamic team of 140+ professionals and grow your career in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

About the Role

We’re seeking a Remote Property Manager to oversee a portfolio of 150–175 residential properties (single-family homes, townhomes, and condos). This is a client-facing, customer service-driven role that does not involve managing staff. You’ll serve as the primary point of contact for tenants and property owners, ensuring smooth operations and prompt issue resolution.

Property management experience is preferred but not required — we provide full support and training for the right candidate!

What You’ll Do

- Manage daily operations for a portfolio of residential rental properties.
- Communicate effectively with tenants, property owners, contractors, and internal teams.
- Respond promptly to emails, voicemails, and service requests.
- Manage work orders in AppFolio; coordinate repairs with in-house techs and third-party vendors.
- Approve maintenance invoices and ensure services are completed properly and on time.
- Maintain low tenant delinquency and work within the owner’s budget.
- Oversee the turn process for vacant units, including cleaning and maintenance.
- Ensure compliance with local property codes and certifications (e.g., rental licenses, lead certs).
- Handle lease renewals, move-outs, and security deposit reimbursements.
- Keep detailed records and stay organized across multiple tasks and systems.

What We’re Looking For

- High school diploma or equivalent
- Strong communication and exceptional customer service skills
- Ability to write professional emails and manage multiple tasks
- Basic knowledge of residential maintenance issues
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office (especially Outlook & Excel)
- Experience with AppFolio or other property management software is a plus
- Detail-oriented, organized, and a proactive problem solver
- Comfortable working independently in a fast-paced remote environment

Perks & Benefits

$10 USD/hour
15 days of paid time off (PTO)
100% remote work
A supportive and friendly team environment
Opportunities for growth and advancement within the company

If interested, please send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info with the email subject "Property Manager - Your Surname".
